name: Do Not Be Negative
description:
This game prototype is a casual game which integrates elements of tower defense game and card construction. You will use your cards to put items on the map, such as sweet bomb, cat, and lucky money,  to prevent the people who are terribly negative from approaching the ones who are optimistic. In the process of game, you have to update and improve your cards.

    《别丧啦》是一款融合塔防元素和牌组构筑元素的游戏，玩家需要利用自己的手牌，放置诸如糖果炸弹、猫咪、红包等道具，来阻止丧人们把丧文化传染给快乐的小人。同时，随着游戏的进程，玩家需要不断优化自己的牌组构成。
